Class ExtendedArchiveManager.AbstractWorkerThread

java.lang.Object

          com.isti.util.IstiNotifyThread

Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtendedArchiveManager.ArchiveItemWorkerThread, ExtendedArchiveManager.PurgeWorkerThread
Enclosing class:
ExtendedArchiveManager
protected abstract static class ExtendedArchiveManager.AbstractWorkerThread
extends IstiNotifyThread

Class AbstractWorkerThread is a general worker thread for archive managers.
